module.name: lang/strategy-reference
module.description: This module provides a mechanism for capturing a reference to a strategy and for applying the referred strategy.
module.author: Vlad Vergu <v.a.vergu add tudelft.nl>

strategy.name: to-sref
strategy.description:
Capture a reference to a strategy as a term. The strategy s must be fully specified (i.e. all its arguments must be specified).
to the strategy is only valid within the instance of the interpreter which produced it

strategy.name: apply-sref
strategy.description: Apply the strategy referenced by the term. The referenced strategy is applied to the input term.
